Articles.Content:
basically i started a thread earlier this year asking "are aliens real?" and this guy said he saw a craft launch from duna, so me and my friend we're gonna go there, but earlier today something was launching from duna nothing we did just a probe launched by aliens! since it wasen't anyone else and we went out from the tracking station, came back after and there was one in orbit around duna then went came back, and a bit later one landed on ike!, and then shortly after one is at kerbin landed at KSC. so me and my friend go over to it i climb on it (xD) and kinda explodes a bit after a while, but then weird stuff happend only to my friend like duna and ike moving places the mun really close to kerbin (only for him) restarting his game fixed it but... he kinda looked up or whatever and saw like a mothership and a beam kinda teleported him and some stuff very close for to the mun, then it happend again with a few like eeloo, duna so ... has anyone seen this before? very wierd.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-17T17:31:25Z" title="05/17/2015 05:31  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 17, 2015</time> by LucaBunny77**
  
more understandible

I'm not sure how I feel about this... I think LucasBunny is actually an alien from Alpha Centauri trying to infiltrate the forum for the secrets of kraken powered spaceships.

i think the moving planets it's just a glitch and maybe teleports aswell but probes just randomly come from duna [orbit duna, landed on ike, landed on duna, landed at kerbin KSC] but i think in the future they will make manned (if not in-game secretly like this already)

of course you all will be like "it didn't happen" but did you see it? no. keep watching duna and see i will get pics next time

You're full of cesium salami and/or beryllium bologna.

While I have to agree that I find this story dubious, it's unpleasant for everyone if we go around the forum mocking each other and accusing each other of lying. Please, people, either discuss the subject politely, or just skip to the next thread.

Sounds like you're online playing with a friend (mods?)

Probably somebody playing pranks on you.
A number of posts have been removed from this thread. For the second time, if you can't be polite while disagreeing with someone, don't post at all.
Actually, DMP and Hyperedit would explain everything the OP has encountered, but he seems to have disappeared...
